programme.desc: Property guru Ann Maurice tackles a bungalow in Hove that will not sell thanks to a lurid colour scheme that is scaring would-be buyers away

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George, Peppa and Mummy Pig go shopping, and George tries on lots of new clothes at Miss Rabbit's shop

programme.title: Pip and Posy
programme.desc: The friends have fun with a balloon

programme.title: Getting Personal
programme.desc: Presenter Deepa Shastri meets graduate Hamza Shaikh who is often mistaken for a child

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Dark Command (1940)
programme.desc: A teacher is defeated in his ambition to become the marshal of his town during the early years of the American Civil War, so he turns renegade instead. Before long he has a reputation as a feared raider fighting on the side of the South, and it falls to the newly appointed lawman whose job he coveted to stop his reign of terror. Western, starring John Wayne and Walter Pidgeon

programme.title: Attack! (1956)
programme.desc: An American infantry lieutenant fighting in German-occupied Belgium is convinced an inept but well-connected officer is not fit for command. When his unit are wiped out after another of the officer's mistakes, the lieutenant miraculously survives and returns to base seeking revenge. Second World War drama, starring Jack Palance, Eddie Albert, Lee Marvin, Buddy Ebsen and Robert Strauss

programme.title: Lonely Are the Brave (1962)
programme.desc: A rebellious modern-day cowboy breaks out of jail and escapes on horseback - but reckons without the relentlessness of the authorities, who give chase by car and helicopter. A dogged sheriff leads the pursuit, coming to sympathise with his quarry. Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Walter Matthau, Gena Rowlands and George Kennedy

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone (1958)
programme.desc: A drifter rides into a town dominated by the members of a ruthless family. He befriends a Mexican in jail for killing a man who attacked his sister and tries to save him from the gallows, getting caught up in the evil clan's running internal conflicts in the process. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Craig Stevens, Manuel Rojas and Barry Kelley

programme.title: Evolution (2001)
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: Knives Out (2019)
programme.desc: Wealthy crime novelist Harlan Thrombey invites his kin to an 85th birthday party at his mansion, but festivities are cut short by arguments. When the writer apparently commits suicide, Detective Lieutenant Elliott and Trooper Wagner attend the scene, while private detective Benoit Blanc hovers in the background, closely observing family members. Writer/director Rian Johnson's comedy crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Chris Evans and Ana de Armas

programme.title: The Ring (2002)
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinski's remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit (2014)
programme.desc: A former soldier injured in the line of duty takes up a new career as a financial analyst for the CIA. However, his deskbound position changes to a dangerous undercover assignment when he discovers a plot to destroy the US economy. Spy thriller inspired by Tom Clancy's novels, starring Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner and Kenneth Branagh, who also directed

programme.title: Went the Day Well? (1942)
programme.desc: Villagers in a remote English village eagerly help a large group of Allied troops billeted in their town, but when they realise the soldiers are disguised German paratroopers acting as the vanguard of an invasion, they must pull together to thwart the enemy. Second World War drama, directed by Alberto Cavalcanti and based on a story by Graham Greene, starring Leslie Banks, Basil Sydney, Mervyn Johns and Marie Lohr

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared (1959)
programme.desc: The leaders of the tiny European duchy of Grand Fenwick decide to solve their bankruptcy problem by declaring war on the USA. They confidently expect to lose and thereby qualify for economic aid - but the plan takes an unexpected turn for the worse when the Americans surrender. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers in three roles, with Jean Seberg, William Hartnell, David Kossoff and Leo McKern

programme.title: Midnight Lace (1960)
programme.desc: American heiress Kit Preston is living a life of luxury in London with her new husband, but her idyllic life is shattered when she is terrorised by strange phone calls and voices in the fog. Her husband dismisses the threats as a practical joke, but as the scary incidents and menacing calls mount it becomes clear that someone really does have it in for her. Thriller, starring Doris Day, Rex Harrison, Roddy McDowall, Hermione Baddeley and Myrna Loy

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck! (1960)
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama, charting the mission to track down and eliminate the pride of the German fleet, a fearsome battleship devastating British vessels in the North Atlantic, orchestrated by a British naval officer recovering from his wife's death in an air raid. Starring Kenneth More, Dana Wynter, Laurence Naismith and Karel Stepanek

programme.title: Deep Impact (1998)
programme.desc: A TV reporter investigating a presidential misdemeanour stumbles on evidence that a comet is on a collision course with Earth, threatening the future of the human race. Meanwhile, an astronaut prepares to lead his crew on a do-or-die mission to intercept the danger. Sci-fi drama, starring Robert Duvall, Tea Leoni, Morgan Freeman and Elijah Wood

programme.title: Air Force One (1997)
programme.desc: The American president is forced to take drastic measures to save his family when their plane is hijacked by Russian terrorists demanding the release of a jailed radical general. Meanwhile, the vice president tries to manage the crisis from Washington and has to decide whether to shoot the aircraft down. Action thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman, Glenn Close, Dean Stockwell and William H Macy

programme.title: True History of the Kelly Gang (2019)
programme.desc: During the 19th century, Australian bushranger Ned Kelly and his gang flee from the authorities. Three-part drama based on Peter Carey's Booker prize-winning novel, starring George MacKay and Essie Davis

programme.title: And When Did You Last See Your Father? (2007)
programme.desc: A successful writer learns that his father is dying of cancer, and returns to his family home. As time passes, he looks back at his complex, confrontational relationship with his father over the years and tries to come to terms with the conflict between them. Drama, based on Blake Morrison's autobiographical book, starring Jim Broadbent and Colin Firth

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder (1965)
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper

programme.title: Fire Down Below (1957)
programme.desc: Felix and Tony run a tramp steamer together in the West Indies, but their seemingly unshakeable friendship is tossed aside when they both fall in love with the same woman. Tony tries to undermine his rival by exposing his illegal activities, while Felix responds with deadly intent. Romantic drama, with Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth (1959)
programme.desc: An explorer discovers a prehistoric monster-infested world deep beneath Earth's crust and faces a tough ordeal escaping the predatory attacks of the creatures as he tries to guide his team back to safety. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Pat Boone, James Mason, Arlene Dahl and Diane Baker

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The captain of Russia's first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelow's fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard

programme.title: Hustlers (2019)
programme.desc: Strip club employees band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients, drugging stock traders and CEOs who visit the establishment then running up bills on their credit cards. Comedy crime drama, starring Jennifer Lopez, Constance Wu, Julia Stiles, Lizzo and Cardi B

programme.title: Misery (1990)
programme.desc: A successful author finds his relief at being rescued from a near-fatal car crash is severely tempered by the discovery that his saviour is a fan with psychopathic tendencies. The situation takes a turn for the worse when she discovers he has killed off her favourite character - and sets about coercing him to do a rewrite in nightmarish fashion. Oscar-winning thriller, starring James Caan, Kathy Bates and Lauren Bacall

programme.title: The Assistant (2019)
programme.desc: Jane, a young graduate, lands her dream job as a junior assistant to a commanding entertainment mogul, but over the course of one day realises her vocation has turned into a nightmare. She decides to take a stand when things take a dark turn and power is abused. Writer/director Kitty Green's drama, starring Julia Garner and Matthew Macfadyen

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes and Felix decide to throw a surprise party for Warren, Scott shares some exciting news with Maxine, and Honour is pushed to her limits

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Leah comes up with a plan to help Darren persuade Charlie to return home. Meanwhile, the Chen-Williams children are taken aback when they hear some shocking news

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Rosaria bought Bella Luna to realise her son Gianfranco's ambition to become a chef, but the Italian restaurant's future looks bleak due to his lack of experience in the kitchen combined with her refusal to acknowledge the eatery's many flaws. Gordon Ramsay heads to Easton, Pennsylvania, to help the troubled pair and save the business from financial disaster

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants he helped that were among the biggest challenges he faced, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or turned back into nightmares. First he meets sisters Rita and Lisa to see if they have continued serving fresh instead of frozen food at Boston's La Galleria 33, before heading to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, to discover whether controlling owner Tom has kept his promise and handed over the reins to his daughter Andrea. Finally, Gordon goes back to the Prohibition gastro pub in Everett, Washington, to catch up with owner Rishi and learn if she has ditched belly-dancing in favour of running her business

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Following Erica and Geoff's break-up, Murray decides to take Erica out on a daddy-daughter date to cheer her up, and Adam is excited to participate in the school senior prank

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: With Geoffrey away on spring break, Lainey heads to Hollywood to see her best friend. Adam is invited to join the cool kids' poker night

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy try to eliminate stress from the planning of their wedding by applying mathematics to the process. Meanwhile, Raj 'breaks up' with Howard after realising that his best friend is actually damaging his confidence

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Howard plan respective birthday celebrations for Amy and Halley. A letter from his brother makes Leonard feel anxious about his own lack of accomplishments. The series takes a mid-season break until the new year.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Luke spend father-son time together searching for hidden treasures beneath the house, Mitch and Cam cause embarrassment by inviting Lily's paediatrician to lunch, and Haley takes her driving test

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil finds himself in an awkward situation when he meets his former high-school girlfriend, who confesses she still has feelings for him, while Mitchell stands up to his boss and Jay summons up the courage to confess he killed Manny's turtle

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The precinct gets a new detective who is coming away from a 12-year undercover assignment with the Mob. Boyle's latest mess lands everyone in trouble with the caretakers, and Gina directs a video about the precinct for Captain Holt. Jason Mantzoukas and Kate Flannery guest star

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Holt allows Santiago and Peralta to house-sit for him while he visits Kevin in Paris, but mayhem ensues when Holt's beloved dog, Cheddar, goes missing on their watch. A romantic fling between Adrian Pimento and Diaz disrupts life at the precinct, disgusting their co-workers

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends fight over a ring they believe was used in the Lord of the Rings film trilogy. Leonard hopes to return the item to its rightful owner - but Raj wishes to sell it so he can buy a jet ski, and Sheldon develops a Gollum-like obsession with the precious object

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is awarded a prestigious prize by the university, but is scared of collecting the gong at a ceremony because he knows he'll have to give a speech. Penny tries to gee him up with rousing references to X-Men, and Leonard and Raj offer psychological guidance - without much success

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A brilliant but reclusive scientist, Dr Wolcott, invites Sheldon to his cabin in the middle of nowhere, so Leonard, Raj and Howard go along for the trip. Penny and Bernadette improvise when Amy doesn't like the tame bachelorette party they have planned for her. Peter MacNicol guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon isn't pleased by the newfound popularity of Stuart's comic book shop when an author puts the place on the map. When Raj attempts to take the credit for Penny's astronomical discovery, friendships are tested. Howard and Bernadette try to arrange a date night

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire finds herself becoming an overbearing mother when she finds out that Alex has a crush on a boy, and Haley's idea of sisterly advice is not helping matters. Meanwhile, Mitchell and Cameron have an argument over the former's aversion to public displays of affection, and Gloria believes that her grandmother has been visiting in her dreams. Comedy, starring Ed O'Neill

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: An earthquake strikes, leaving Claire stuck in the bathroom with a plumber. Meanwhile, the tremor causes Manny to experience an existential crisis, and Mitchell struggles to remain calm. Comedy, guest starring Nathan Lane (The Producers)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: In a New Girl crossover episode, Peralta runs into Jess Day, who is visiting New York from Los Angeles, and enlists her help on his latest case. Holt looks for ways to improve the team's morale as they come to terms with being on the night shift, while Santiago is filled with curiosity when Diaz starts to take long breaks from her desk. Zooey Deschanel (New Girl) and Matt Walsh (Veep) guest star

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: On Halloween, the squad members follow precinct tradition and pull out all the stops as they compete for the title of Ultimate Detective Slash Genius in the Halloween Heist. Peralta, Santiago and Holt are the determined competitors - but who will be crowned the reigning champion?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Conflict arises when Leonard's newly divorced parents and Sheldon's devoutly religious mother are all in town at the same time. And when Howard and Raj are contacted about the guidance system they've developed, they assume that the government is out to get them. Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends struggle through an awkward morning after Sheldon's mother and Leonard's father share an evening together. Penny's family arrives in town to attend Penny and Leonard's second wedding ceremony. Keith Carradine, Laurie Metcalf, Christine Baranski and Judd Hirsch guest star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An embarrassing secret from Howard's past comes to light as he tries to win back Bernadette, while Sheldon and Raj engage in a battle of wills when they have to work in the same office. Guest starring Katee Sackhoff and George Takei

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is depressed that everyone seems to be paired off except him, and resorts to desperate measures to get a girlfriend. Meanwhile, Sheldon looks for a way out of his relationship with Amy, who wants him to meet her mother. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Warren goes back on his promise to Sienna, Donna-Marie wants someone to talk to, and James visits Eric in prison with his appeal strategy update

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: All eyes are on Bronte and Harrison, and Claire and Jesse at the penultimate Commitment Ceremony, while Alyssa and Duncan unexpectedly fall apart on the couch

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Sam confronts Joel over his treatment of Inga, while Ruby has a dilemma after Harvey goes on a promising first date with new girl in town Mel

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Britain's Got Talent, The Thief, His Wife and the Canoe, Romeo and Duet, Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof, The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up To Cancer, Roar, Stacey Dooley Sleeps Over, and Expedition Bigfoot

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson hosts a Pride special, celebrating all of the most memorable singletons from across the sexual spectrum. Plus, a chance to catch up with some of the unforgettable pickers, including 75-year-old bisexual Ian - the show's oldest ever picker, Raheem the professional dancer looking to 'pop his gay cherry', and transfeminine singleton Callie, who came on the show to find her first 'proper' date

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Liverpool lass Alex sits down for a meal with union rep Sam, and they immediately click over their political beliefs - but she isn't too sure when he reveals his musical preferences. Three-times divorcee Zina meets undertaker to the stars Chris, whose job has so far been the kiss of death. Can he convince her he is a catch? DJ Charli sets Scott her usual test for any potential partner - seeing how he reacts to her friend Pascal, who she always carries round with her - and 33-year-old mummy's boy Frank hopes confident gym beauty Nisha will see through his shyness

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: All eyes are on Bronte and Harrison, and Claire and Jesse at the penultimate Commitment Ceremony, while Alyssa and Duncan unexpectedly fall apart on the couch

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Sam confronts Joel over his treatment of Inga, while Ruby has a dilemma after Harvey goes on a promising first date with new girl in town Mel

programme.title: Below Deck: Mediterranean
programme.desc: The chef and chief stew have an icy stand-off, and the guests are disappointed when incoming weather forces the boat back to the marina

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon goes to Las Vegas and does everything he can to win a large sum of money for science. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette take Amy shopping for a wedding dress, but her terrible choice entangles them in a web of lies

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly encourages Principal Ball to establish a non-athlete senior night, while Erica's friends are not interested in being pre-wedding fun captain so she asks Geoff's sister

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly learns Linda Schwartz is hosting Thanksgiving and is concerned that her role is being threatened, while Pop-Pop surprises the family by showing up with a new lady friend

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Leah comes up with a plan to help Darren persuade Charlie to return home. Meanwhile, the Chen-Williams children are taken aback when they hear some shocking news

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: A shocking secret that has been buried for years comes to light when Warren finds out the truth about his parents. Cindy tries to find out who wants to buy the Bazaar

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef heads to Babylon in New York, where the peace of Long Island is regularly shattered by the volatile Pellegrino family, proprietors of Peter's Italian Restaurant. Gordon finds owner Tina's work to save the eatery from oblivion is frequently ruined by the behaviour of her brother, a tyrannical front-of-house manager whose violent temper constantly undermines staff morale

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef tries to reverse the fortunes of the Mixing Bowl diner in Bellmore, New York, where a talented cook's work is being undone by the manager's marketing plans - putting the finances in dire straits

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: All eyes are on Bronte and Harrison, and Claire and Jesse at the penultimate Commitment Ceremony, while Alyssa and Duncan unexpectedly fall apart on the couch

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Sheldon kicks Amy out of the apartment so that he can have some 'alone time' to work, she and Leonard bond during a series of science experiments. Bert the geologist replaces Howard in his band Footprints on the Moon, and Sheldon finds Penny to be a surprising source of scientific inspiration. Laurie Metcalf and Brian Posehn guest star

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire help out with their children's school projects, while Gloria and Cameron spend quality time together. Elsewhere, Mitchell and Manny learn they have more in common than they thought during a trip to watch a meteor shower with Jay. Comedy, starring Ty Burrell and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire struggles to get hold of the year's must-have gadget for Phil's birthday. Cam gets involved in a neighbour's marital problems, while Mitchell decides it is time to toughen up. Comedy, starring Julie Bowen, Ty Burrell, Eric Stonestreet and Jesse Tyler Ferguson

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Terry tackles an old case with Jake's help to prove his mettle to his old precinct, while Adrian becomes Charles' new roommate and Amy goes on a difficult training exercise with Holt and Rosa

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Diaz enlists Peralta to help change Jeffords' disapproving opinion about her fast-moving relationship with Pimento. However, the new couple's love for each other has to be put on hold when Pimento comes to believe that someone from his past is trying to kill him

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard tells Penny he loves her, but fails to get the response he would have liked. Sheldon also finds himself competing against Star Trek: The Next Generation actor Wil Wheaton once again when the gang goes bowling - and tries to get his revenge

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to hide the fact he had dinner with Penny after she broke up with Leonard, hoping to stay friends with her. However, keeping secrets does not prove to be his strong point, and it isn't long before his deceit is exposed. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon goes to Las Vegas and does everything he can to win a large sum of money for science. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette take Amy shopping for a wedding dress, but her terrible choice entangles them in a web of lies

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Sheldon learns that his mother won't attend his wedding unless he invites his brother Georgie, he and Leonard travel to Texas to end a family feud. Meanwhile, Howard and Bernadette's children inadvertently give them, Amy and Raj conjunctivitis. Jerry O'Connell guest stars

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: In an episode inspired by Hitchcock thriller Strangers on a Train, Claire and Mitchell agree to be brutally honest with each other's partners - so Phil is informed his stand-up comedy is cringeworthy, and Cam is told his decision to wear biker shorts is unwise. Comedy, starring Julie Bowen and Jesse Tyler Ferguson

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Tired of the family's obsession with electronic gadgets, Claire and Phil declare a household challenge to see who can stay unplugged the longest. Mitch and Cameron frantically try to get Lily into the best pre-school, while Jay and Manny are concerned at the lengths to which Gloria will go to stop the neighbour's dog barking

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: When Pimento and Diaz decide to tie the knot, the squad members try to prepare the perfect wedding under Santiago's careful direction. Peralta and Gina help Pimento to find his grandmother's ruby earrings so that Diaz can wear them at the ceremony. Jason Mantzoukas guest stars

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta goes to extremes trying to impress Santiago's father at Thanksgiving dinner. Boyle is on turkey duty, and Holt helps Pimento deal with no longer being able to work for the NYPD

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard has a meeting with Colonel Williams, a representative from the US air force's department of material command, about the gyroscope he invented with Leonard and Sheldon. Penny accidentally reveals that Bernadette is pregnant to their colleagues at work. Dean Norris guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Tensions rise when the guys struggle to complete their Air Force project on time and are forced to work around the clock - leaving Sheldon fighting to stay awake. Penny and Amy attend a university gathering at the home of Bert the geologist. Raj learns Bernadette's true feelings about her pregnancy when he helps her to clear out the spare room for a nursery

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj's sister Priya visits the gang, causing tension when Leonard tries to cover up the fling he once had with her. After discovering his friend's secret, Sheldon struggles to keep quiet, leading the guys to reveal information they have all been keeping from one another

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard vows to be more self-assured around women, believing his problem attracting a girlfriend stems from a lack of confidence. An FBI agent interviews the gang to assess Howard's suitability for a team working on a new surveillance satellite. Guest starring Eliza Dushku

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: An unfriendly familiar face shows up at the casino night. Elsewhere, Imran is feeling suffocated by his mum and Zain's over protectiveness

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: The experts introduce a new, radical phase to the experiment - Feedback Week - and the first stage of this brand-new phase is partner swap

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The gang goes on the infamous sociology and geography field trip to Swanage, during which Neil tries his hardest to avoid the advances of over-friendly teacher Mr Kennedy. Meanwhile, Will takes a shine to new girl Lauren - but she is only interested in Simon. Comedy, starring Simon Bird

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will is unhappy about being forced by Mr Gilbert to take a work experience job at a garage due to a mix-up that sees Neil joining a newspaper. Meanwhile, Jay sorts out a placement for himself and Simon at his father's plant hire company. Starring Simon Bird and Blake Harrison

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: A look back at the times when what started as great chemistry in the studio ended in dating disaster, reliving memorable arguments and cringeworthy moments, including bisexual Leah from the third series, who brought her pet dog Kush to the studio to help her pick her partner. There is also a reunion between Cathy from Hertfordshire and her date Andy

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Singletons including Mayfair-based jewellery designer Miki, hapless city worker Arnie, IT worker and self-confessed nerd Sam, Game of Thrones fan Livvy, and fortysomething divorcee Louise meet up, hoping to find love at the most romantic time of the year. This instalment of the dating show also sees the return of mummy's boy Frank, who is determined to put his best foot forward on his date with half-Iranian nurse Catherine who wants to find someone to cuddle in with on a Saturday night while watching Titanic

programme.title: Below Deck: Mediterranean

Jim Parsons and Mayim Bialik star, with guest appearances from Laurie Metcalf, Kathy Bates, Mark Hamill, Jerry O'Connell and Teller (the quiet half of US magic duo Penn and Teller)

Gordon is dismayed to discover unprotected meat and fish left next to mouldy pesto jars in the kitchen and plans to close down the eatery until radical changes are made

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef comes to the aid of a French restaurant in the heart of Moorpark, California. However, the owner is vigorously opposed to change, despite the failings of his current business model

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire is suspicious when Grandpa Dunphy pays a surprise visit, while Cameron tries to find his inner drummer when he joins Dylan's band. Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria regret taking Manny to see a horror film. Comedy, guest starring Fred Willard

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Amy has to go undercover at a women's prison and befriend one of the inmates in order to try to get information about a criminal operation. Back at the precinct, Holt and the team plan a fake funeral in an attempt to catch a hitman

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: After identifying the mob informant, Holt, Jake and Rosa make plans to infiltrate FBI headquarters to get the man's files, with the captain bringing in his former partner to help out. Guest starring Dennis Haysbert (24's President Palmer)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon invites a famous physicist to the flat after befriending her online, but is put out to find Leonard showing an interest in her. Meanwhile, Penny has to confront her ex-boyfriend when the visitor turns up in his bedroom. Guest starring Judy Greer (Glenn Martin, DDS)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The comedy flashes back to reveal how Sheldon saved the lives of his pals, and looks at the origins of his friendship with Leonard seven years previously, as well as explaining the housemates' agreement. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Friends and family gather as Amy and Sheldon prepare to tie the knot - but it seems the happy couple's minds are elsewhere. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy's honeymoon runs aground in New York, Penny and Leonard discover that they are uncomfortably similar to Amy's parents, while Raj insults astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and starts a war on social media. Kathy Bates and Teller (of Penn and Teller fame) guest star as Amy's parents

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire prepares the Dunphy household for Halloween, but the rest of the family is less enthusiastic. The spooky goings-on remind Cameron of a traumatic childhood experience, and Gloria is upset when Jay and Manny make fun of her accent

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: While Claire and Haley fall ill at the same time, Phil wages battle against a defective smoke detector after concluding it is saying 'you're not a man' to him. Elsewhere, Manny accidentally gets one of Jay's employees dismissed. Comedy, starring Ty Burrell and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: When a famous author receives death threats, Peralta and Jeffords take the case so that Jeffords can meet his lifelong hero. Gina wants to choose the location of the annual Boyle family vacation, and Santiago gets in the middle of a fight between Captain Holt and Kevin

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta and Holt find the motivation to help Captain CJ with a big case that is proving problematic. programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard and Bernadette decide they do not want to know the gender of their unborn child, but are upset when they hear Raj has found out before they have. After Amy's apartment floods, she proposes a cohabitation experiment with Sheldon to stay with him while her apartment undergoes repairs

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Things don't run smoothly as Amy and Sheldon's cohabitation experiment continues, forcing Leonard and Penny to intervene when the couple have an argument about the 'bathroom schedule'. However, the pair are soon disturbed by unexpected guests dropping by

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny's father pays a visit and Leonard discovers she told her parents they were back together, so he plays his boyfriend role to the hilt - much to her dismay. Meanwhile, Raj gets drunk and makes a pass at Howard's girlfriend Bernadette. Guest starring Keith Carradine

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft

Michelle and Fred fell in love with the island after holidaying there over 20 years ago, and now the time is right to use their £190,000 budget to find somewhere where they can bring Michelle's mother and their three grandsons to enjoy too

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Two Brits decide to move in together in France and start a B&B business, while a Scot tries to follow in his father's footsteps by opening a restaurant in the Costa del Sol

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien search for more items to fix up and sell on, visiting a Norman castle, restoring a Fiat 500 and making a table from part of Southend pier

programme.desc: Henry Cole restores two quad bikes and a stylish sun lounger, while Simon O'Brien rescues a holed canoe and turns an old oak beam into a spice rack

programme.title: Heir Hunters
programme.desc: The probate researchers look for the relatives of a possible spy who encountered some remarkable people in his life, and an heir to the estate of a woman whose family earned a living working on the railways. Plus, details of more cases in which beneficiaries still need to be found

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The owners of Guest and the City, Dan and Mardi Leonard, welcome their visitors in Brighton, but there is a mixed reaction to the couple's contemporary decor and stained glass windows. The unconventional furniture leaves some guests confused, and one pair of fellow hoteliers bemoan the lack of sausages at breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Entrepreneur Phil Kiernan invites the contestants to the Farmer's Boy Inn in Longhope, Gloucestershire, where he challenges them to a pie-making competition. However, the task proves less entertaining than the bickering that occurs between two guests as they try to share a kitchen

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Alan and Jane Asher host on the Geanna, their purpose-built hotel boat. Dan and Mardi Leonard are concerned space is too tight, while Sarah Langford and Jean-Pierre Kujawa worry about their privacy being invaded. A trip up the Thames allows the guests to sip champagne and get to know the ropes, but the mood at dinner is subdued, and when the owners cook their first breakfast on board they find themselves bickering

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Sarah Langford and Jean-Pierre Kujawa, who have run the Sentry Mead B&B on the Isle of Wight for six years, play host in the last challenge of the week. The guests arrive with high expectations and after a few setbacks, the dinner and breakfast win everyone over

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to learn how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers before discovering who has won the week's competition. Old tensions resurface as the results are announced, and there are heated exchanges around the table

programme.desc: Competitive couple Skye and Jacob are at odds over whether to love or list their 1940s bungalow in Melbourne's Kew East. Skye is on Team List It, dreaming over property pages on a daily basis, while Jacob refuses to move from the place he loves to call home. Andrew Winter tries to shift Jacob out of this house, while Neale Whitaker woos Skye into loving her home once and for all with some fancy cushions

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It

Sarah and her wife Pepper have opposing views on what to do with their two-bedroom terrace, as Sarah thinks it is time to move on, but Pepper is digging her heels in and wants to convert the loft

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Tim and Rebecca battle to get their chateau looking tip top for a tour operator who may potentially want to put it on his books for visitors to the nearby Le Mans motor racing track. The clock is ticking for Fiona as she has 24 hours to prepare for her first ever wedding, and ensure that her 12-acre grounds are picture perfect for the big day. Karen, Paul and their two children need to make their chateau attractive to guests. Their latest plan is to restore a disused hen house, but tensions rise when Paul doesn't meet Karen's standards

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin revisits traditional builder Paul and his wife Carol who, back in 2015, set out to create a bold, fortress-like home on the southern edge of the West Pennine Moors in Bolton

programme.title: Britain's Most Luxurious Train Journeys

The train's staff help out with a surprise wedding proposal and a 90th birthday celebration, while executive chef Nick creates masterpiece meals including a shin of Galloway beef and a trio of mini desserts

programme.title: The Queen's Coronation: Behind Palace Doors
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the conflict between the Queen Mother and Prince Philip over how to administer Princess Elizabeth's coronation in 1953. While the public was presented with an image of the Windsors as a firmly united family, the pair clashed over Philip's desire to introduce the population to a monarchy ready to adapt to modern times. This programme charts the Queen Mother's efforts to protect the royal reputation she helped rebuild after the abdication of Edward VIII

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Doctors treat a young woman who has been thrown from a horse, which then trampled on her, and also a woman who was hit by a car while riding her motorbike on a dual carriageway. An 11-year-old boy is brought into hospital after running into a wall at school and hurting his wrist

programme.title: Food Unwrapped

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft
programme.desc: Presenters Rav Wilding and Angellica Bell make stylish braided coasters, and presenter Amanda Lamb faces actress Debra Stephenson in the timed challenge, where they have 30 minutes to create personalised embossed greeting cards

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman helps house hunters Sue and Ray search for a retirement home on the Spanish island of Lanzarote, showing them five properties for their budget of £130,000

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Two hoteliers prepare for their first big booking in France, it is crunch time for a British restaurant in Spain and a new boat business is stranded when the engine malfunctions

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien visit Essex, where Henry restores a car trailer and a 1970s racing bike, and Simon turns his attention to lovingly restoring a vintage model aircraft

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon O'Brien and Henry Cole head to Middlesex and Surrey, where projects include repurposing a 1950s hairdryer, updating a school desk and the restoration of a child's motorbike

programme.title: Heir Hunters
programme.desc: The probate researchers solve a 20-year-old case and reveal the story of a pilot who died in the final days of the Second World War. Plus, retired weather presenter Michael Fish discovers his family history and learns he is the heir to an unclaimed estate

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Alan and Sylvie welcome their guests to the Watersedge Guest House in Barton-on-Sea, Hampshire, but an afternoon of deer-watching leaves some of them bored. Desperate to impress their fellow B&B owners, the pair host a Hawaiian barbecue, before pulling out all the stops at breakfast time

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Owners Tim and Amelia Whitaker welcome their guests to their non-star-rated boutique accommodation, Nearwater, on the south Cornish coast, and take them out on a boat for a spot of seal watching and diving. However, the sight of wet suits proves too much for one contestant, and tensions also flare over dinner when Mike and Danny are quizzed about their relationship

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Eva Buschmann hosts the competition at the Roundhouse Hotel in Weymouth, Dorset. She makes the mistake of assuming Danny Robinson and Mike Gibson are a couple, and offers them a double room with an exposed shower, but hopes a lesson in abstract art and a meal at her favourite harbour-side restaurant will win the other contestants over

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Mike Gibson and Danny Robinson host their rival B&B owners at their four-star guesthouse - Homecliffe Hotel in Blackpool. The hosts take their visitors on a tram ride along the seafront and on to Madame Tussauds, but there are complaints about uncomfortable mattresses and disappointing views and the next day's breakfast fails to impress

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to discover how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers and air their grievances. Watersedge hosts Alan and Sylvie start the proceedings, but confront the guests who complained about their room having no en-suite facilities, before the winner is announced

programme.title: Love It or List It Australia
programme.desc: Ray and Dana's cottage in Lilyfield, Sydney, is pretty but has a disjointed feel to it. The death-defying staircase is right in the middle of the dining room and the main bathroom is also in the wrong spot, also in the dining room. Ray loathes the thought of buying and selling again, but would prefer to cut their losses and buy a new home that doesn't have them compromising on anything. Dana can see beyond the bad layout and honestly believes a renovation will dramatically improve the way the family live. They invite Andrew Winter and Neale Whitaker to offer their opinions and advice

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Phil Spencer and Kirstie Allsopp meet the Pogsons in Harrogate, North Yorkshire and offer advice to the family who are unsure whether to renovate their property or find a new home. After living in their three-bedroom house for 16 years, Carol thinks that it is time for a big change, but Andrew is adamant he is not moving house

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Tim and Rebecca receive a booking and prepare for the imminent arrival of their first paying guests. Martin and Kim take their chateau search up a gear and view the last property on their list. Paul and Karen embark on creating a cinema room in their barn, but the building looks set to collapse and their hopes of breaking even start to crumble. Angel helps to cushion the blow by upholstering a family heirloom

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets actor Sean Simons, who has bought the ruins of Cloontykilla Castle in Co Roscommon with a view to using them to create a spectacular mock 16th-century home. However, the outlandish plans - including Jacuzzis in the battlements and water-spouting gargoyles - have Kevin worried the project could become a garish nightmare, and his scepticism increases when he realises Sean has not consulted an architect. Disaster seems to be looming as the contractors grow frustrated and planning regulations are ignored, but somehow things slowly begin to take shape - until a national economic crisis plunges everything into chaos

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E

Rong Fen and Dong arrive at the Rotunda for the birth of their second baby, and a healthcare worker goes into early labour with her twin girls at just 29 weeks' gestation

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft
programme.desc: Reality TV star Sam Thompson and TV personality Debbie McGee test their craft skills with pretty marbled clay napkin rings

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Two British B&B owners battle with teething problems, an English-run boating company takes a large booking, and a home renovation project is jeopardised when a staircase collapses

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel the length of Britain turning unwanted junk into profit for their owners. In this episode they're on the south coast, where Henry gets to work an aircraft fuel tank while Simon gets obsessed with an iconic 1960s speedboat

programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien visit Surrey and Middlesex. Henry restores a pair of racing go-karts to race against restorer Guy, and Simon repurposes an old butcher's block into a coffee table

programme.title: Four in a Bed

A vinegar-tasting session also receives a tepid response, and some of the visitors are bemused by their hosts turning up for breakfast in costume

programme.title: Four in a Bed

Tension mounts as George and Linda become increasingly frustrated with Lisanne, and the bickering continues over dinner when Shaun is confronted about his previous negative feedback

programme.title: Four in a Bed

Danny wants to do up the property and sell it on, but Alex has other ideas, and thinks the house is the perfect place for them to start a family

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Anna and Edward host another big wedding, but Edward is put out of action and with the food delayed and the weather threatening to take a turn for the worse, Anna has to work hard to pull it off without a hitch. With only one guest room up and running, they're in a race against time to double their income by the end of the summer season. Paul tackles a leaking outbuilding to finish the cinema room, while Karen does all she can to bag their first wedding booking

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets artists Indi and Rebecca, who are planning to construct a modern, larch-clad home on the Isle of Skye, with a second hand-crafted building alongside to use as their studio, all on a tight budget of £150,000. They have been saving for years, but making it happen will mean taking on the savage weather, not to mention the sceptical locals - and as if that weren't enough, most of the work is being done by one man, local builder Donald

programme.title: Matt Baker's Travels in the Country: USA
programme.desc: Matt delves deeper into the rural side of Florida life and discovers it is the birthplace of the US cowboy. He visits a citrus farm in Polk County to discover how tangerines are grown and harvested before helping to sort and size them in the pack house. On his journey to Homestead, Matt meets a legendary fruit farmer who explains that Florida also produces a large variety of fruit including the rare guanabana. Matt then heads to Texas to visit the Caprock Canyons State Park

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: Two-part special following the case of a naked man found stabbed to death in Luton, which leads police to discover this may be one of a series of murders in which men are lured with the promise of sex, so that they can be robbed. DI Dale Mepstead turns her attention to two men who are seen on CCTV accompanying the suspects into a flat. Will either of the women being held in custody reveal their identity?

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 79-year-old woman is airlifted to hospital after being involved in a road traffic collision, with consultants concerned that she may have life-threatening internal bleeding. Meanwhile, 80-year-old Mohammad has come to A&E after falling at home during a family Eid celebratory feast, and 56-year-old Russ is brought in after falling from a ladder while cutting back some trees at work

programme.desc: Celebrities undertake some of the most perilous journeys in the world. Driving up Madagascar's eastern coast at the tail end of the rainy season is enough to test the best of friendships, but comedy actor Angus Deayton and broadcaster Mariella Frostrup are game enough to take on the challenge, and good enough friends to poke fun at each other along the way. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a new journey following his Bradshaw's handbook from the heart of the industrial East Midlands to the island of Lindisfarne off the coast of Northumberland. On the first leg, he gives an old engine a fresh start in the railway hub of Derby, heads to Nottingham to find out about the Victorian origins of a well-known high-street chemist and calls at a historic one-time grocer's shop in Grantham, Lincolnshire

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from Derby to Lindisfarne, with this leg beginning in Boston, south Lincolnshire, where he explores the connection between the town and its American namesake. At Southwell, Nottinghamshire, he discovers the origins of a favourite Victorian apple before heading into West Yorkshire to visit an imposing institution built in Menston to provide asylum for those with mental health issues. In nearby Wakefield, Michael boards one of Britain's least frequent services, before heading to Hensall, North Yorkshire

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the third leg of his journey from London to Newton Abbot, Michael Portillo travels from Taunton to Minehead. Along the way he explores a church, finds out just what it takes to operate a 19th-century signal box and summons all his strength to move a 110-ton steam locomotive

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from Derby to Lindisfarne, with this leg beginning in Boston, south Lincolnshire, where he explores the connection between the town and its American namesake. At Southwell, Nottinghamshire, he discovers the origins of a favourite Victorian apple before heading into West Yorkshire to visit an imposing institution built in Menston to provide asylum for those with mental health issues. In nearby Wakefield, Michael boards one of Britain's least frequent services, before heading to Hensall, North Yorkshire

His last stop of the day is York, where he learns what made the city a centre for the sweet-making industry

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo begins the fourth leg of his journey from Derby to Lindisfarne in Middlesbrough, visiting one of the last iron foundries in the town and helping cast a carrot valve for a steam engine. His next stop is Darlington, Co Durham, where he meets the editor of the Northern Echo and finds out about the colourful history of WT Stead, one of his predecessors. Michael then heads to St Paul's monastery in Jarrow, Tyne and Wear, to learn about eighth-century monk the Venerable Bede, known as 'the father of English history', before finishing in Hexham, Northumberland, where he visits a historic ginger beer emporium

programme.desc: Teacher Jo is the fourth to host in and around Brighton, treating her rivals to a Thai menu. But the hit-and-miss food and a dessert drama leave her in a panic

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lee Juggurnauth helps West Midlands couple Lynn and Barry find a home on Spain's northern Costa Blanca, where they plan to permanently relocate along with their two cats Bob and Marley. Property expert Lee shows the pair the best of what their £180,000 budget can secure

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: The team tracks down fascinating facts from around the world related to the growing British tradition of savouring takeaway food, on which a billion pounds is spent a month. Jimmy Doherty is in Thailand to discover the unexpected addition in spring rolls. He then heads to India to find out the real reason takeaway curry can be so delicious - the mythical ingredient, ghee. Amanda Byram spills the beans on coffee and learns why some cups leave consumers more 'buzzing' than others. programme.desc: At West Orchards in Coventry, senior officer Lewis turns detective when a stallholder reports a theft an hour after it happened. He reviews the CCTV footage, pinpoints the incident and tracks down the perpetrator outside the shopping centre. A department store calls in a suspected perfume theft, but until they can review their footage and confirm it security officer Mal keeps track of the suspect on CCTV

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Harrow Housing Enforcement Officer Sheetal Rajani is carrying out a series of surprise inspections when a distressed tenant approaches her. Sharon, a single mother of three, has been living with rats, bed bugs and damp. Her landlord believes the problem comes from the flat upstairs, but the landlord upstairs is not allowing them access

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: The driver of a suspected stolen car seems determined to escape at all costs, with several police cars rammed and badly damaged during a hair-raising pursuit along a dual carriageway. PC Nick Lovatt is trailing a car believed to be involved in the supply of drugs and when the vehicle is being washed at a garage, four police cars swoop and quickly detain two men sitting inside

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Jamie Theakston presents as Derbyshire's finest pursue law breakers in the heart of the country. A BMW car skids on the wet road into the motorway's central barrier

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A failure to stop in Hartlepool turns into an armed stand-off and a full-blown kidnapping situation, while a 14-year-old boy is found in possession of a bag of crack cocaine, cash and a knife. Lee goes on a high-speed pursuit through Stockton, and Jacko and Simon tackle a drug driver who is wearing a balaclava

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: AJ and Richie are in pursuit of a van speeding through narrow country lanes, while Jacko and the team box in a van carrying large quantities of cannabis. Sparks fly when dog handler Justin and police dog Elsa capture two burglars on a building site

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: During a dramatic pursuit, Faulko is rammed off the road at 80mph and has to be rushed to hospital, while the team battles to tackle the aftermath of the crash, and track down the driver responsible. Meanwhile, timing is everything as Liam locks up a rogue biker with the help of patience, pepper spray and the actions of a heroic passer-by

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.desc: Noel wants to get fit and enters a 10k race, but when he has a health check, the results are worrying for him and the whole family. Luke has something really big to tell the family, while Sue and Noel face the biggest decision of their lives - whether to have another baby or decide that 22 kids is enough

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors

Meanwhile, a young patient with a painful rash around his mouth and chin is treated by Dr David Jewell, and a woman comes in to receive the results of a smear test

programme.desc: Paramedic Ayshe and special sergeant Hannah respond to two calls - a car that has crashed into a wall and ended up on its roof and a heated argument in a convenience store

programme.title: 999: Critical Condition

Abigail, aged 20, is treated for a painful neck injury caused by a riding fall, and 28-year-old Laura is brought in having a severe asthma attack. It is clear to Dr Fawcett she is deteriorating fast and that her heart could stop at any moment

The paediatric team treat a range of patients, from three-year old Ivy, who is having a prolonged epileptic fit, to 15-year-old Ben, who has got a broken toe

programme.title: Evil Up Close: Women Who Kill
programme.desc: A woman trusted to care for a much-loved - but lonely and disabled - man takes his life in a callous act driven by money and greed

programme.desc: Documentary about Zephany Nurse, a newborn baby stolen from hospital in Cape Town in 1997, and the extraordinary circumstances that reunited her with her long lost family. For 17 years her parents searched for her, until in 2015 Zephany was found by coincidence at their second daughter Cassidy's new school. The Nurses were overjoyed, but the arrest and trial of the woman whom Zephany knew as her loving mother devastated her, and she chose to remain with the kidnapper's family

When choosing the style of the second, modern kitchen, Giles is keen to be sympathetic to the period property, hoping the brand new kitchen blends into this home steeped in history without ruining its period charm

Acclaimed American detective drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate a seemingly random drive-by shooting, but soon suspect the victim's husband may know more than he is letting on. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis trace a robbery suspect to a militia group, but McCoy is strangely affected by the leader's devotion to his cause - and begins to receive death threats once the case comes to court. Award-winning police drama, starring Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach

Meanwhile, Abby studies evidence relating to fire-starter Bruce Johnson, who died when his car exploded, and discovers coded messages in his quarters that indicate he may have been working as part of a larger gang. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tries to track down wanted terrorist Harper Dearing before another US Navy ship is destroyed, and a desperate Gibbs enlists the aid of a prisoner to draw his target out of hiding. programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

Drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A CIA agent's fiancee is raped and murdered by a professional hitman, suggesting an assassination, but the detectives suspect a man resembling the victim's partner could have invented the story to cover up an affair. Crime drama, guest starring Dylan Walsh (Nip/Tuck), with Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The son of Fin's ex-wife stands trial for the rape and murder of a woman and her baby but, after having had the first case revoked, his lawyer tries to get him off the charges again by discrediting the SVU. Benson, Fin and Stabler are ordered to appear as witnesses for the defence in court, where questionable past decisions come back to haunt them. Guest starring Chris 'Ludacris' Bridges

programme.title: Private Eyes

Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate a case of alleged child abuse, but soon realise their attention should actually be focused on the woman who made the report. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.desc: A carjacking turns nasty when an off-duty police officer is killed and the driver is kidnapped. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston and Benjamin Bratt

programme.desc: The murder of a Middle Eastern man sends Briscoe and Curtis racing to thwart a suspected terrorist plot to bring destruction to New York - and leads them to uncover a domestic conspiracy involving horrific female circumcision. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.desc: McCoy faces bad memories when a drunk driver kills three people - and finds himself forced to protect the perpetrator in the process. Award-winning police drama, starring Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach

programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when three dehydrated survivors from a helicopter crash are discovered. The pilot is initially missing, but his body later washes ashore with a gunshot wound to the head. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS

During the course of the investigation, Gibbs chances on a medal awarded to Leroy Jethro Moore, the man he was named after and an estranged friend of his father. Guest starring Billy Dee Williams (The Empire Strikes Back) and Ralph Waite (The Waltons)

programme.desc: Part one of two. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A San Diego stalker is killing brunette, female college students in a variety of gruesome ways and BAU's new addition Ashley Seaver needs to prove her worth before more teenagers meet the same grisly fate. Drama, starring Rachel Nichols and David Rossi

programme.title: Criminal Minds

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Lake team up with FBI agent Lauren Cooper to track down a serial killer who has claimed the lives of more than 20 women - but discover that he too has been murdered. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate a rape case involving a girl and her older sister's boyfriend, but when questioned, the suspect claims he committed the crime in his sleep. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is accused of murdering two Arab-Americans - but his attorney mounts a novel defence, claiming he was compelled to kill because he is genetically predisposed toward hatred and violence. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An autistic man dies in police custody, and when Briscoe and Logan investigate, they discover he was receiving a number of unusual and illegal treatments. The inquiry also sheds light on the deceased's parents, who seem reluctant to pursue a prosecution

programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: John Mannering does a deal with a crooked insurance agent in order to recover an Aztec mask worth a hundred thousand pounds from an ex-convict

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: The story of British Airways Flight 38, which was on final approach into London Heathrow Airport when it crashed just short of the runway on 17 January 2008. What had been an uneventful passenger flight from Beijing soon turned almost fatal just moments before landing when a lack of power to both engines caused the Boeing 777 to crash. The quick thinking by the crew led by Captain Peter Burkill prevented the incident from being fatal and saved all 152 people on board

programme.title: Floyd on Britain and Ireland
programme.desc: Chef Keith Floyd visits Norfolk, where he continues his culinary journey by engaging in the county's fishing traditions - catching and cooking brown shrimp. Then it's off to RAF Mildenhall to sample some American cuisine, before he prepares a dish of duck and peas and learns how to make Norfolk dumplings

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Monroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of this amazing city that normally lie undiscovered.

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: The King of Youth declares everything old is worthless, and kidnaps Tripitaka in an effort to impress his father. To make matters worse, Monkey's powers prove useless against the immature monarch. Masoaki Sakai, Toshiyuki Nishida, Shiro Kishibe and Masako Natsume star

programme.title: The Devil's Disciple (1959)
programme.desc: The black sheep of a family is befriended by a minister. A case of mistaken identity leads both men to discover their true vocations during the American War of Independence. Historical drama based on George Bernard Shaw's play, starring Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas and Laurence Olivier

programme.title: Tiara Tahiti (1962)
programme.desc: Two chalk-and-cheese British Army officers decide to settle a long-standing grudge in a Tahitian resort during peacetime. Comedy, starring James Mason and John Mills

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: The Alphans board a mysterious spacecraft, where they encounter a mobile computer named Brian - which soon leads them into danger. Sci-fi adventure, with Martin Landau and Catherine Schell

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh learns how to make Chinese zong dumplings from her mother Christina, and finds out what it's like to work a shift in the kitchen of Andre Ursini's busy restaurant

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh and Jono choose a big range of plants at the nursery, meet an adventurous young chef and get some help from their friends and neighbour

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: A prize-winning Maine Coon needs a new home as it is feeling stressed out living in such a large group of other cast, so Clare tries to help owner Claudia find a suitable one

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: The Comic Strip Presents
programme.desc: A schoolteacher in a quiet village in Norfolk is torn between life with her boring husband and embarking on an affair with a pop star. Dawn French and Jennifer Saunders star

programme.title: Big City Life

programme.desc: IBA unlicensed boxing events. See prize fighting in its raw form as contenders go toe-to-toe in the ring

programme.title: My Day (2019)

To make up for the money that was stolen from her, she is forced to take on one last assignment. Crime drama, starring Hannah Laresa Smith and Mike Kinsey

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: William decides to take Mary's advice and lose a few pounds, while the object of his affections is relieved to be given another chance at work, on the condition that she make herself available for night calls. It's a busy time at the funeral parlour, as three teenagers are killed in a car accident, and Molly seizes the opportunity to move closer to her daughter. Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham and Cheryl Campbell

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Number Two subjects Number Six to a ruthless week-long interrogation in a bid to persuade him to reveal why he resigned from his job. Penultimate episode of the vintage drama, starring Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: Bleak House
programme.desc: Lady Dedlock visits Jo concerning Nemo, and later meets the Jarndyce wards

programme.title: Mr Pip (2012)
programme.desc: A teenage girl in war-torn Papua New Guinea finds comfort in the story of Charles Dickens' Great Expectations taught to her by her English teacher. However, her actions have unforeseen consequences when an army sent to destroy the rebels becomes convinced the mysterious Pip is their leader. Drama, starring Hugh Laurie and Xzannjah Matsi

programme.title: Speak Like a Child (1998)
programme.desc: A couple are reunited with a man they grew up with in a children's home years earlier - but the apparently happy reunion soon dredges up dark secrets from their past, and it's not long before tensions bubble to the surface. Drama, starring Cal Macaninch, Daniel Newman, Richard Mylan and Rachel Fielding

programme.title: Bleak House
programme.desc: Lady Dedlock visits Jo concerning Nemo, and later meets the Jarndyce wards

programme.title: Eden Lake (2008)
programme.desc: A couple on a romantic break find their peace shattered by a gang of youths who steal their belongings and vandalise their car. However, when they confront the youngsters they are subjected to a horrific attack, resulting in a deadly game of cat and mouse through the woodland. Horror, starring Kelly Reilly and Michael Fassbender

programme.title: Floyd on Britain and Ireland
programme.desc: Keith finishes off his tour in the Orkney Islands, where he makes Orcadian fish soup and samples a local cheese. His final stop is the island of Stronsay for a Ceilidh celebration and a brew of Bridges Cog

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: Ling tricks Ang into believing she has stolen Ming the Rat Guardian's Power Band

programme.title: Dork Hunters from Outer Space
programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times.

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home.

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Mannering and Cordelia are in an Iron Curtain country where they are about to hand over some money at a secret rendezvous

programme.title: Bleak House
programme.desc: Lady Dedlock visits Jo concerning Nemo, and later meets the Jarndyce wards

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: The King of Youth declares everything old is worthless, and kidnaps Tripitaka in an effort to impress his father. To make matters worse, Monkey's powers prove useless against the immature monarch. Masoaki Sakai, Toshiyuki Nishida, Shiro Kishibe and Masako Natsume star

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: The Alphans board a mysterious spacecraft, where they encounter a mobile computer named Brian - which soon leads them into danger. Sci-fi adventure, with Martin Landau and Catherine Schell

programme.title: Runaway Railway (1966)
programme.desc: A group of youngsters trying to save a railway line from closure are tricked by crooks planning a robbery. Children's adventure, starring John Moulder-Brown and Kevin Bennett

programme.title: Seance on a Wet Afternoon (1964)
programme.desc: A self-professed medium with a greed for money and publicity arranges the kidnap of a wealthy industrialist's daughter, with the intention of winning acclaim and the ransom when she locates the child using her alleged psychic powers. British psychological thriller, starring Kim Stanley, Richard Attenborough, Mark Eden, Nanette Newman, Gerald Sim and Judith Donner

programme.title: Big City Life
programme.desc: Documentary following a group of West Ham FC fans who have formed friendships by wearing colourful shirts when they support their team in the stands

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: A prize-winning Maine Coon needs a new home as it is feeling stressed out living in such a large group of other cast, so Clare tries to help owner Claudia find a suitable one

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: A new manager arrives at the recently built Whitbury leisure centre - but things get off to a shaky start when he selects a poolside attendant who cannot swim. First episode of the comedy, starring Chris Barrie

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: The London transport museum, But not the one in Covent garden

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: The Hidden City
programme.desc: Members of Mathews' gang are disappearing, forcing Luther to return to a world he thought he had left behind

programme.title: A Day At the Beach (1970)
programme.desc: A self-destructive drunk loses control while looking after a little girl during a day trip to the seaside, Drama, starring Mark Burns and Beatie Edney

programme.title: Fascination (1979)
programme.desc: A thief seeks refuge in a grand castle, and is pleasantly surprised by the two beautiful women living there. However he soon realises his seductive hosts are addicted to drinking fresh human blood. French horror, starring Brigitte Lahaie, Franca Mai and Jean-Marie Lemaire

programme.title: Live MNF
programme.desc: Leeds United v Liverpool (Kick-off 8.00pm). Live coverage of the Premier League clash from Elland Road, as the home side battle for three vital points in their quest to stay in the division. The reverse fixture saw a shock as the Yorkshire side beat Liverpool 2-1 at Anfield back in October. Crysencio Summerville's 89th-minute winner helped Leeds to their first win against the Reds since November 2000
